name: Who did it? (miguellangeloo)
description:
One of your friends died apparently  commited suicide but you (Jake) know that did not happen. It's up to Jake to show the truth to his friends.

This is my first game on Ren'py so let me know what can be improved, what you liked more about the game and what you liked the least!

When played on a mobile browser the textbox gets transparent, this isn't mean to happen! if someone know how to fix it please let me know!
